content.query:
CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW user_sends_created
 WITH(DISTRIBUTION = HASH ([date]))
 AS
 SELECT
    CONVERT(DATE, [date], 102) as [date]
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN send_type = 'Text' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as text_sends
    ,SUM(CASE WHEN send_type = 'File' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as file_sends
    ,COUNT(*) as send_total
FROM [dbo].[send_created]
WHERE user_id IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY CONVERT(DATE, [date], 102);
